ComicInfo.Summary:
In the second issue of the Bob's Burgers comic book we bring you 5 new stories from the Belchers. Tina's Erotic Friend Fiction goes galactic; Bob jots down burgers to live by; Louise investigates a case of textbook tomfoolery; Linda looks out for her furry friends; and Gene presents a musical re-imagine-actment of the story of Mozart and Salieri called "Genemadeus" Bob's Burgers is an animated sitcom that airs on Fox television with other hits such as The Simpsons and Family Guy.
ContentsTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Battleship Galac-tinaBurger of the Day Ideas: 10 Commandments BurgersLouise's Unsolved Mysteries and Curious Curiosities: Louise's LegacyLetters From Linda: Dear Dumpster Divas Waste ManagementGene Belcher Presents: Genemadeus, The Musical*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Steve Umbleby | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Cover | Steve Umbleby | 2 |
